War Cabinet.(Previous Reference; W.P.(G)(40)322).The attached Tables summarise the information furnished by Departments in respect of the week ending7th December, 1940.It should be explained that the hours lost are expressed as a percentage of the total hours normallyworked. It will be appreciated that, particularly in large Departments, the figures must be based on thebest estimate which can be made, e.g. as regards staff who take work to the shelters or who occupy rooms inwhich they decide to continue working after the secondwarning. To this extent the figures are approximate.(Signed) E.E. BRIDGES.Richmond Terrace, S.W.I.,18TH DECEMBER, 1940.COPY NO.
